>" I'm sure you wouldn't have wanted to do this either Optimus, and 
>I can see why that sometimes the hardest lessons are learned when you face an 
>enemy upon who has been your comrade for many years. But if this were you, I 
>trust you would do the same."

For a moment, as Rodimus stood there before this somewhat smaller Autobot there was a brief moment of clarity, a small instant of indecision. This Autobot showed a bravery and strength that seemed oddly familiar to him. 

>" All right, have it your way Rodimus. This is going to hurt me 
>more than it will hurt you." 

However the moment passed as the dark Predacon shell programming that twisted his own kicked in. He smiled, as he cracked his knuckles, "You're right, this is *will* hurt you more than it will hurt me." Rodimus replied in mocking tones. 

With a quick motion he stepped foward to snap a quick punch towards Tuscon's head, ready to end this battle with this little upstart Autobot - there was something about him that annoyed him!

In the meantime Cyclonus and Scourge had stepped back; watching the opening of the battle with looks of eagerness as they studied the moves of both combants.

(TAG)

Preston
(Cyclonus/Scourge/Rodimus)
